name: pr-tracker
description: GitHub PR Progress Tracker for ADHD/bipolar developers

scripts.build: bun run build:backend && pnpm run build:frontend
scripts.install:all: bun install && cd backend && bun install && cd ../frontend && pnpm install
scripts.test: bun run test:backend && pnpm run test:frontend
scripts.lint: bun run lint:backend && pnpm run lint:frontend
scripts.lint:backend: cd backend && bun run lint || true
scripts.clean: rm -rf backend/dist frontend/dist backend/node_modules frontend/node_modules node_modules

author: Joe Czarnomorph
